abstract: Mormon Church moves forcefully against John P Dehlin, prominent critic who founded website that has become a forum for thousands of skeptical Mormons; charges Dehlin with apostasy, citing his support of same-sex marriage and the ordination of women, and threatens him with excommunication; threat follows wave of excommunications by church in past year.
lead_paragraph: The Mormon Church has moved against the prominent Utah-based founder of an online forum for doubting Mormons, charging him with apostasy.
snippet: The Mormon Church has moved against the prominent Utah-based founder of an online forum for doubting Mormons, charging him with apostasy.

headline.main: Mormon Church Threatens Critic With Excommunication
